npcLines: Lin. You're back. What have you found out about Beebe's?

playerChoices.text: Captain, I found this ledger. It details some very suspicious transactions.
Grayson and Shauna are definitely up to something, but I don't have hard proof yet.
I wasn't able to find anything conclusive, Captain.
I need more time to investigate.

npcLines: A ledger? Let me see that... By the ashes, this is... more than I expected. Names, dates, shipments of military-grade hardware... This confirms our worst fears. And then some.
You've done well, Lin. Exceptionally well. This is the break we needed.
Hmm. Suspicions are one thing, evidence is another. Without something concrete, my hands are tied. Fallbrook is a tinderbox, I can't just go raiding businesses on a hunch.
Keep at it, Lin. There's a reason they call it 'investigation'. Find me something I can act on.

playerChoices.text: I understand, Captain. I'll keep digging.

npcLines: Unfortunate. I was hoping you'd turn something up. Perhaps it was a false alarm... or they're better at covering their tracks than I thought.
Keep your ear to the ground. Let me know if anything changes.
For now, we monitor. This ledger implicates some dangerous people beyond just Grayson and Shauna. We need to understand the scope of this network before we make a move.
You've put yourself at considerable risk bringing this to me. The FPD is in your debt.
